item.title: CVE-2024-30221|2024-08-02T01:25:03.408Z -- wp%20sunshine -- sunshine%20photo%20cart
item.description: Deserialization of Untrusted Data vulnerability in WP Sunshine Sunshine Photo Cart.This issue affects Sunshine Photo Cart: from n/a through 3.1.1.

item.title: CVE-2024-30194|2024-08-02T01:25:03.366Z -- wp%20sunshine -- sunshine%20photo%20cart
item.description: Improper Neutralization of Input During Web Page Generation ('Cross-site Scripting') vulnerability in WP Sunshine Sunshine Photo Cart allows Reflected XSS.This issue affects Sunshine Photo Cart: from n/a through 3.1.1.
